items.title: Ask HN: What would you imagine AI looks like in the future?
items.summary:
In the past, we learned a lot of wild imaginations about robots and AI from fiction books.･*･:≡( ε:)
Do AI and robots seem like the imaginations in those novels? I’m not sure. Is AI nowadays the “AI” we used to think about in the past? If you think with the old ideas, what would AI look like? What would AI do? And how would AI work with humans? ⁽⁽ଘ( ˙꒳˙ )ଓ⁾⁾ Comments URL: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=46143943 Points: 2 # Comments: 1

items.title: Show HN: A free AI Room Design tool that redesigns any room in seconds
items.summary: I recently built a free AI Room Design tool that lets you upload a photo of any room and instantly generate redesigned versions. Multiple styles are available: modern, minimalist, Scandinavian, industrial, and more. It works directly in the browser, no login required, and preserves your room’s layout while applying the new style. Would love to hear feedback on styles, UX, or technical improvements! Comments URL: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=46143387 Points: 6 # Comments: 0

items.title: Show HN: Seedream 4.5 – High-Consistency AI Image Generation for Creators
items.summary: Hi HN, we’ve been working on Seedream 4.5, a next-generation image model focused on high consistency, realistic detail, and multi-image creative control. It’s designed for creators who need stable characters, clean structure, and production-grade visuals — not just lucky one-off generations. Key features: Multi-Image Consistency: Maintain the same face, style, lighting, and scene logic across batches or sequential renders. High-Fidelity Rendering: Improved materials, shadows, anatomy handling, and fine-detail realism. Flexible Workflows: Supports text-to-image, reference-to-image, multi-reference fusion, style transfer, layout-aware generation, and high-res outputs. Creator-Ready Editing: Modify backgrounds, clothing, mood, and composition while preserving identity and structure. Fast Iteration: Generate multiple variations, refine style, or re-render consistent character sets in seconds. Why we built this: Seedream 4.5 aims to make coherent, editable, production-oriented image generation accessible to artists, designers, marketers, and anyone building multi-shot or multi-style visual workflows. We’d love feedback on: How you’d use high-consistency image models in your projects. What tools or APIs would make Seedream easier to integrate. Try it here: https://www.seedream4.net/seedream-4-5?i=d1d5k Comments URL: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=46142882 Points: 1 # Comments: 0

items.title: Show HN: Copyly – AI that beats competitor product descriptions in 30 seconds
items.summary: I built Copyly to solve a problem every e-commerce team faces: writing product descriptions that actually convert. Instead of hiring expensive copywriters ($2,400+/month) or spending hours writing copy, you paste a competitor URL and get superior descriptions in 30 seconds. What it does: Analyzes competitor URLs to understand what works Generates multiple variants with SEO scoring Maintains your brand voice across thousands of products Exports directly to Shopify/WooCommerce Results so far: 31% higher conversion rates vs human copy 10x faster than traditional methods Used by 10,000+ brands The key insight: instead of starting from scratch, analyze what's already working and make it better. Try the demo (no signup): https://saa-s-marketing.vercel.app/ What features would make this most useful for your e-commerce needs? Comments URL: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=46142648 Points: 2 # Comments: 0
